name: credchain-descentralizado
description: Sistema Descentralizado de Credit Scoring CredChain

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:eliza" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:database"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:database" "npm run dev:blockchain" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:eliza" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:eliza && npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:eliza && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../eliza-runtime && npm install && cd ../web-frontend && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install && cd ../substrate-node && npm install
scripts.clean:packages: cd packages/api-gateway && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../eliza-runtime && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../web-frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mobile-app && rm -rf node_modules

author: CredChain Team
